## KoattyMetadata.remove() method

Removes the given key and any associated values. Normalizes the key.

**Signature:**

```typescript
remove(key: string): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  key | string | The key whose values should be removed. |

**Returns:**

void
